af_fund_allocation.description: 99% of protocol fees go to the Assistance Fund (AF) for HYPE token buybacks.
af_fund_allocation.mechanism: Market buybacks to reduce circulating supply.

dat_enterprise_funds.description: Large-scale institutional funds for Digital Asset Trust (DAT) purchases. These funds are often in a 'waiting' state due to compliance, settlement, and on-chain confirmation processes associated with enterprise-level transactions.

hip3_staking.description: Deployers must stake 500,000 HYPE to permissionlessly deploy new perpetual contract markets. This stake serves as a security guarantee and is subject to slashing by validators if the market is manipulated or operates poorly.
